Articles.Content:
Ladies and gentlemen, I present to you:

The Tranquility 1!

The interplanetary stage was first used to go to Dres, but I kept it in orbit figuring that "it might be useful some day".

The refueler by the way was the biggest ship I had ever made that actually worked.

And, for a finale I am posting a nice picture of the ship

Good luck and god speed the Tranquility 1.

EDIT:

"If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of Kerbals."

Mods used:

Werhnerchecker: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/63591-0-25-WernherChecker-v0-3-1-Customizable-In-Editor-Pre-Flight-Checklist-(Oct-13)

Editor Extensions: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/38768-0-25-Editor-Extensions-v1-4-11-Oct-2014-(EdTools-Editor-Tools-replacement)

Edited November 13, 2014 by pauldbk99
